testcase.name: Add Condition to Loan Sanction
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged into the application...............................undefined When the user navigates to the Loan Origination module......................skipped And the user clicks on Loan Management......................................skipped And the user selects Credit L2..............................................skipped And the user opens the Loan Application.....................................skipped And the user navigates to the Credit tab....................................skipped And the user clicks on Loan Sanction and scrolls down the page..............skipped And the user clicks on Add Condition........................................skipped When the user enters the condition and clicks on the Save button............skipped Then the user should be able to add conditions successfully.................skipped

testcase.name: Delete Sanction Condition Successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User is on loan sanction page.........................................undefined When user clicks on delete sanction condition...............................skipped Then the sanction condition should deleted successfully.....................skipped Then the sanction condition should be removed from the list.................skipped And I should see a message Sanction condition deleted successfully..........skipped

testcase.name: Cancel the sanction condition deletion
testcase.system-out: And I cancel the deletion in the confirmation popup.........................undefined Then the sanction condition should remain in the list.......................skipped And I should not see any deletion confirmation message......................skipped

testcase.name: Edit an existing sanction condition
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the loan sanction page.................................undefined When the user clicks the "Edit Sanction" button.............................skipped And updates the sanction condition and changes the status...................skipped And clicks the "Save" button................................................skipped Then the sanction condition should be successfully updated, and its status should be changed to Complete..skipped
